      • generatePOJO

        public void generatePOJO(java.io.File indir,
                         java.io.File outdir,
                         java.lang.String templateFilename,
                         java.lang.String filter,
                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params,
                         java.util.List<com.viper.database.model.Table> cache)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Given the input directory scan for all XML files, using the templateFilename convert the XML file to a Java POJO bean.
        Parameters:
        indir - the directory containing all the model XML files, which contain the database/table definitions.
        outdir - the directory to which all java bean files are to be written.
        templateFilename - the filename of the template to use to generate the java pojo beans.
        databaseName - the name of the database to be processed, (deprecated this should be in the model XML file).
        filter - the filter on the input files to be applied.
        params - hash map of params to feed into the template file processing.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • generateSeed

        public void generateSeed(DatabaseInterface dao,
                         java.io.File indir,
                         java.lang.String filter,
                         com.viper.database.model.DatabaseConnection dbc)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Convert the given XML Document object to a String object. If an error occurs, log it and return a null object.
        Parameters:
        dao - The database interface (DAO) object, which maybe null.
        indir - the input directory where files will be processed, read in.
        filter - a filter to be applied to the input files.
        dbc - the database connection object, contains database url, username, password, etc.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • generateBeans

        public void generateBeans(com.viper.database.model.DatabaseConnection connection)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Given a database connection, generate beans for all tables in the database connection, could be the entire database.
        Parameters:
        connection - the database connection object, contains database URL, username, password, etc.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
